name: cboroson-ReadSecrets
description: Reads values from Key Vault to allow sharing data between releases
author: Craig Boroson

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the Service Bus namespace specified above.

inputs.name: KeyVaultName
inputs.label: Key Vault Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing Azure Key Vault.

inputs.name: secretOption
inputs.label: Secret retrieval option
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retrieve either a single Key Vault secret by name or multiple secrets filtered by tags.

inputs.name: secretName
inputs.label: Secret Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of secret to retrieve.  This disables the ability to filter secrets by tags.

inputs.name: TagValue1
inputs.label: Tag Value 1
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag value to filter by.  This can be used to return select secrets using the syntax $(foo).

inputs.name: TagValue2
inputs.label: Tag Value 2
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag value to filter by.  This can be used to return select secrets using the syntax $(foo)

inputs.name: TagValue3
inputs.label: Tag Value 3
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag value to filter by.  This can be used to return select secrets using the syntax $(foo)
